Version 2.0, 20 September 2017


To offer you all collaborative benefits of our services and the associated account, it is necessary to collect certain data from you.


• To use your account in our systems, and to inform you about necessary changes about your account (e.g., updates/violation of our Use of Terms of Use and Service or of community rules) or our policies, we will store your username and, if provided by you, your E-Mail address. If you’ve connected your account via Google Plus or Facebook, we additionally store an identification key connected to your account on these services. We will not use this data for any other (e.g., marketing) purposes, unless you explicitly allowed us to do so.


• To avoid misuse of our services (e.g., through user contributed uploads or comments) for illegal purposes, the user generated public data will be stored internally in a database, together with a timestamp and the used IP address.


• To improve our services (apps and websites) and to do scientific research on ICT and STEM education, we use Google Analytics, Crashlytics and Firebase by Google Inc. to get metadata about the usage (e.g., timestamps, visited pages/screens, used operating system, and information about the network provider). This analysis and the collected data is not linked to your profile and does not contain any personal information.


• On a voluntary basis, you can give us your country of residence through your account page on the sharing site. This will only be used for statistical and research purposes by us and can be removed at any time in your profile settings.


• You can withdraw the usage of this data at any time by deleting your account through your profile page on https://share.catrob.at/. After deleting your account you will still be able to use the provided services, but not to collaborate, e.g., through uploading programs, commenting or liking. Also all provided content linked to your account, e.g. uploaded programs, comments, will get deleted.


• All Services are provided by the non-profit free open source Catrobat project under the umbrella of the International Catrobat Association – Verein zur Förderung freier Software (Graz, Austria).


• To get in touch with us, please send an E-Mail to contact@catrobat.org or mail us to Catrobat,
 c/o
 Institute of Software Technology,
 Inffeldgasse 16b/II,
 8010 Graz, Austria.


In case you are below the age of 16, this policy must be accepted by a legal guardian (usually parents).

It is necessary to agree the Privacy Policy to register or to further use your account. If you do not want that this data gets collected you can delete your existing account via the profile page on our web interface and still use all services of this app that do not need an account.

Ili uruhusiwe kutumia apps na vitekelezeka vingine vinayotolewa na mradi wa Catrobat, lazima ukubaliane na masharti ya utumiaji na huduma zetu na madhubuti kuyafuata unapotumia programu zetu na vitekelezeka vingine. Tafadhali angalia kiunganishi chini kwa uundaji wao sahihi. \n
Unajaribiu kutumia programu hii pamoja na ndege ya AR isiyoongozwa na rubani. Tunakukumbusha sana kufuata masharti ya matumizi ya Ndege hiyo na kwa masharti ya matumizi na huduma za Catrobat.

Programu tumizi hii inatoa mazingira programishi na mkalimani kwa lugha ya programishi wa picha Catrobat.

 msimbo asili wa programu tumizi hii hasa leseni chini ya leseni ya v3 ya AGPL ya GNU. Kwa maelezo zaidi juu ya leseni Angalia link hapo chini.

Kihariri fomula kinakuwezesha kutunga fomula za kihisabati na kimantiki ambazo unaweza kutumia kwenye matofali yako.\n\nUnaweza ukaendeleza utangulizi huu mdogo kwa kugusa kifungo\"Mbele\" chini upande wa kona ya kulia, na unaweza kuruka kwa kugusa kifungo\"RUKA\" chini upande wa kona ya kushoto.
Hapa unaweza kuona fomula yako, na unaweza kuhariri pia.
Sawa na kikokotozi, hapa unaweza kuunda fomula yako.
Kujaribu fomula yako na kuonyesha jibu la sasa, unaweza kutumia \"fanya\".
Huu ni mkusanyiko wa thamani ambao unaelezea kipengee chako cha sasa. Baadhi ya thamani hizi mfano ni x- na y-majira, au spidi ya sasa.

Kama kikokotoleo, kihariri fomula kinatoa kiasi fulani cha kazi za hisabati.\nUnaweza kupata kazi za trigonometric kama \"sin\" na \"cos\", lakini pia jenereta nasibu namba au kazi maandishi na orodha.

Mantiki imetumika kulinganisha thamani na kuunganisha fomula mantiki.\nKulinganisha thamani unaweza kutumia operesheni mantiki kama \">\"(kubwa kuliko) au\"=\"(sawasawa na).\n Kuunganisha fomula mantiki unaweza kutumia operesheni mantiki kama \"NA\",\"AU\" na \"SI\".
Kwenye \"kifaa\"unaweza kupata taarifa kuhusu rekodi za simu au tableti yako.\n Kwa mfano, ugeuzaji wa kifaa chako, au sauti kubwa ya sehemu inayokuzunguka.
Vitofautishi na orodha ambazo hutumika kwenye programu vinaweza kupatikana hapa\nUnaweza ongeza haya kwenye fomula yako, au ongeza mpya.
Tafadhali chagua jina lingine la kitofautishi.
Tafadhali chagua jina lingine la orodha.
Kuongeza tofali lililotengenezwa/tafsiriwa na mtumiaji kwnye tofali lililotengenezwa/tafsiriwa na mtumiaji haihusiwi!
Kosa limetokea wakati wa kuunganisha programu hizi
Tukio la sasa na tukio ulilochagua yako sawa!
Caution! Different resolutions detected. %1$s has resolution %2$d×%3$d and %4$s has resolution %5$d×%6$d. Using resolution of %1$s.

Kitofautishi%1$s kinatumika kwenye programu zote. Kama programu zinatumia majina sawa ya kitofautishi haziwezi kuungana. Tafadhali andika upya jina la kitofautishi kati ya programu moja na jaribu tena.
Orodha%1$s imetumika kwenye programu sawa. Kama programu zinatumia majina sawa kwaajili ya orodha yake haziwezi kuungana. Tafadhali andika upya jina la orodha ya programu mojawapo na jaribu tena.
"Flashi inaweza kutumika tu na kamera yenye flashi. Tafadhali ongeza \"Tumia kamera\" tofali na badili kifaa chako chenye kamera yenye flashi"
Tafadhali unganisha kwenye Chromecast yako kwanza
Mradi wako unatumia matofali yakutupwa na hauwezi anzishwa kienyeji
Vipengele vya kutupwa havijawezeshwa. Tafadhali wezesha vipengele vya kutupwa kwenye vipimo.
.\nHauni kifaa chako? Jaribu kuzima na kuwasha WiFi ya simu yako.
Uunganisho umeisha muda wake. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
Toa kiwango kwa ajili ya programu hii
Kama umefurahia programu hii, tafaudhali toa kiwango chetu kwenye Google paly!
Kufuta kitufautishi ambacho bado kinatumika ni hatari! Una uhakika?
Programu yako inapakiwa kwenye tovuti ya kushirikisha programu ambapo wengine wanaweza kutumia na kuipakua. Unaweza pia kupakua programu yako kama programu yenyewe.
Matofali yote yana chukuliwa katika makundi. Chagua kundi unaloliona.
Kuongeza tofali kwenye hati yako, bonyesha tofali unalolitaka.
Bofya kidogo kwenye tofali fungua menyu kusogeza, nakili, futa, au ongeza tofali kwenye kitambaanyuma. Chaguo la msaada litakuonyesha taarifa ya ziada. Sukuma na achia tofali kwa bofya muda mrefu.
Hii hati inafafanua tabia ya kipengee chako. Kuongeza tofali kwenye hati, bofya kwenye alama \"+\".
Hapa unaweza kupata mwonekano tofauti wa kipengee chako. Kuongeza mwonekano mpya, bonyeza alama\"+\".
Hapa unaweza kuongeza sauti mpya kwenye kipengee chako. Kumbuka akilini kutumia tofali kutoka kwenye makundi ya sauti.
Programu yako ina vipengee tofauti ambavyo vinaweza kuingiliana kila moja na nyingine. Kuongeza kipengee kingine, bofya alama\"+\".
Kuunganisha programu mbili, bonyeza kwa muda kwenye programu moja kufungua menyu ana bofya \'Kuunganisha na\'.
Bofya kitufe cha nyuma kusitisha programu yako. Kuonyesha majira na ukubwa wa skrini wa kifaa chako, bofya \"washa majira\".
Progrmu ina matukio huru tofauti. Kuongeza tukio jipya, bofya kwenye \"+\".
Tafadhali saidia kuboresha programu yetu kwa kututumia ripoti ya matatizo ambayo hayajulikani!
